title: net SetTimeout changes: time.Duration, total operation time
body:
Per discussion with Russ a few weeks ago but lost, and not in bug tracker:

-- net.Conn.SetTimeout, SetReadTimeout, and SetWriteTimeout should take a time.Duration,
not an int64

-- (IIRC) the deadlines should apply to an entire operation, so a trickle of slow single
bytes arriving shouldn't keep a huge Read alive.

That sound correct?
